overview: She'll paint any cock, any color, for $29.95 - with her tongue! She's the best bitch in the booth and she'll give your helmet a shine that could blind a fly! She's Sindee Cox and she's tops in Stuart Canterbury's Topless Body Shop, Part Two of his hit "topless" series.  Oh, and by the way, is that a LeSabre in your pants...  Or are you just happy to see her?
title: Topless Body Shop
